about_the_game:
Introducing the Steampunk Furniture Set, a DLC that brings retro-futuristic elegance to your Hotel.

Embrace Victorian aesthetics infused with advanced machinery. With ornate clockwork furniture, opulent steampunk beds and cogwheels everywhere, your hotel will exude timeless sophistication. Illuminate spaces with enchanting steampunk-inspired lamps and adorn walls with mesmerizing mechanized artwork.

Unleash creativity with functional steampunk contraptions and let guests marvel at the seamless integration of style and innovation. Let’s merge past and future in a symphony of gears and steam!

The Steampunk Furniture Set contains the following DLC:

• 1 Bed
• 1 Armchair
• 1 Chair
• 1 Sofa
• 1 Coffee table
• 1 Table
• 1 Cabinet
• 1 Wardrobe
• 4 Mirrors
• 3 Shelves
• 2 Ceiling lamps
• 2 Standing lamps
• 2 Wall lamps
• 2 Carpets
• 10 wallpapers
• 38 decorations : 8 standing/ 30 wall decorations

The Steampunk Furniture Set is included in the Five Star Edition.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: AMD FX-4300 X4 / Intel Core i3-4130
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 / Geforce GTX 750 Ti - 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 30 FPS, 1920x1080 in low.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500 X / Intel Core i7-6700K
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 / GTX 1070 Ti - 8 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS, 1920x1080 in epic.

short_description: Introducing the Steampunk Furniture Set, a DLC that brings retro-futuristic elegance to your Hotel and embraces Victorian aesthetics infused with advanced machinery.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian, German, French, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
